org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation

Interface EntityContext<E extends EntityContext<E,P>,P extends PropertyContext<E,P>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of a provider-specific entity context definition, following the self-referential generic type pattern
    P - the type of provider-specific property context definition, associated with the specific entity context type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CouchDBEntityContext, DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>, EhcacheEntityContext, InfinispanEntityContext, KeyValueStoreEntityContext<E,P>, MongoDBEntityContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDocumentStoreEntityContext, BaseEntityContext, BaseKeyValueStoreEntityContext, CouchDBEntityContextImpl, EhcacheEntityContextImpl, InfinispanEntityContextImpl, MongoDBEntityContextImpl

    public interface EntityContext<E extends EntityContext<E,P>,P extends PropertyContext<E,P>>
    Entity level to the options navigation API. Let's you define entity level options as well as navigate to a specific properties of the current entity or to another entity.

    Implementations must declare a constructor with a single parameter of type ConfigurationContext and should preferably be derived from BaseEntityContext.

    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E entity(Class<?> type)
      Specify mapping for the entity type
      P property(String propertyName, ElementType target)
      Specify mapping for the given property.

    • Method Detail

      • entity

        E entity(Class<?> type)
        Specify mapping for the entity type
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity
        Returns:
        E the entity context definition

      • property

        P property(String propertyName,
         ElementType target)
        Specify mapping for the given property.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name of the property to be configured, following to the JavaBeans naming convention
        target - the target element type of the property, must either be ElementType.FIELD or ElementType.METHOD).
        Returns:
        P the property context definition
